morla.title: RDF Documents
morla.subtitle: how to open local files or URIs

section.p: You can open RDF Documents with morla's menu. From the file menu item, you can open local files and remote documents on http protocol.

Another function searchs RDF Documents inside a html page. Morla is able to search RDF Documents in web pages on HTTP protocol. It parses the content of these pages and it puts the results in two different lists. The first one has name meta the the other one, other. In the first list you can find the RDF Documents from the HTML header of the web page. In the other list, there are the other results based on the file extensions.
You can also exec Morla with some arguments. If these arguments are local files or URIs, Morla will try to open them in different tabs.
About the Morla's arguments, read the functions page.
